main_definition: Quality refers to the standard or level of excellence of something, often in terms of its attributes, features, or characteristics that determine its worth or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The overall excellence or superiority of a product or service
meanings_and_examples.example: This brand is known for the high quality of their electronics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The degree to which something meets predefined standards or requirements
meanings_and_examples.example: The construction company ensures that all buildings meet strict safety and quality standards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The intrinsic characteristics or attributes of an object, person, or thing
meanings_and_examples.example: Her artwork is known for its unique quality of combining colors and textures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The ability to meet expectations consistently over time
meanings_and_examples.example: This restaurant has maintained high quality food and service since it opened five years ago.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A desirable or noteworthy aspect of a product, service, or entity that contributes to its value or appeal
meanings_and_examples.example: One of the key qualities of this hotel is its excellent customer service.
